channel.title: Maintenance on OLDHU's BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in Maintenance on OLDHU's BLOG

item.title: Chapters and Page Blocks in ATA 2200
item.description:
Reference: Aviation maintenace management

Chapter numbers:

  • 5: Time limits, maintenance checks
  • 6: Dimensions and access panels
  • 7: Lifting and shoring
  • 8: Leveling and weighing
  • 9: Towing and taxiing
  • 10: Parking, mooring, storage, and return to service
  • 11: Placards and markings
  • 12: Servicing
  • 20: Standard practices-airframe
  • 21: Air conditioning
  • 22: Auto flight
  • 23: Communications
  • 25: Equipment/furnishings
  • 26: Fire protection
  • 27: Flight controls
  • 28: Fuel
  • 29: Hydraulic power
  • 30: Ice and rain protection
  • 31: Indicating/recording system
  • 32: Landing gear
  • 33: Lights
  • 34: Navigation
  • 35: Oxygen
  • 36: Pneumatic
  • 37: Vacuum
  • 38: Water/waste
  • 45: Central maintenance system
  • 49: Airborne auxiliary power
  • 51: Standard practices and structures - general
  • 52: Doors
  • 53: Fuselage
  • 54: Nacelles/pylons
  • 55: Stabilizers
  • 56: Windows
  • 57: Wings
  • 70: Standard practices - engines
  • 71: Power plant(package)
  • 72: Engine(internals)
  • 73: Engine fuel control
  • 74: Ignition
  • 75: Air
  • 76: Engine controls
  • 77: Engine indicating
  • 78: Exhaust
  • 79: Oil
  • 80: Starting
  • 82: Water injection
  • 91: Charts(miscellaneous)

Page block(pgblk) numbers:

  • 001-099: Description and operation
  • 101-199: Fault isolation
  • 201-299: Maintenance practices
  • 301-399: Servicing
  • 401-499: Removal/installation
  • 501-599: Adjustment/test
  • 601-699: Inspection/check
  • 701-799: Cleaning/painting
  • 801-899: Approved repairs
